question:
District category contains Civic Center, Senior Living Community, and Municipal Office District.
Supermarkets category contains Publix, E.Leclerc, and Carrefour.
Product category contains Iced Tea, Hummus, and Herbal Tea.
The number of each E.Leclerc 's Herbal Tea equals the sum of each Municipal Office District 's Supermarkets and each E.Leclerc 's Iced Tea.
The number of each Publix 's Hummus equals 20.
The number of each E.Leclerc 's Iced Tea equals 13.
The number of each Senior Living Community 's E.Leclerc equals the sum of each Publix 's Iced Tea, each Publix 's Hummus, each Senior Living Community 's Carrefour, and each E.Leclerc 's Hummus.
The number of each Municipal Office District 's E.Leclerc equals 2 times the sum of each Civic Center 's Supermarkets, each Municipal Office District 's Carrefour, and each E.Leclerc 's Iced Tea.
The number of each Carrefour 's Herbal Tea equals 20.
The number of each Civic Center 's Publix equals 18 more than each Municipal Office District 's Carrefour.
The number of each Municipal Office District 's Carrefour equals 18.
The number of each Senior Living Community 's Carrefour equals 18 times the difference of each Publix 's Hummus and each E.Leclerc 's Hummus.
The number of each Civic Center 's Carrefour equals 7.
The number of each E.Leclerc 's Hummus equals 8.
The number of each Publix 's Iced Tea equals 12 more than the sum of each Senior Living Community 's Carrefour, each Publix 's Hummus, and each E.Leclerc 's Hummus.
How many Supermarkets does Civic Center have?
solution:
Define each Municipal Office District 's Carrefour as I; So I = 18.
Define each Civic Center 's Publix as i; So i = 18 + I = 18 + 18 = 13.
Define each Civic Center 's Carrefour as t; So t = 7.
Define each Civic Center 's Supermarkets as j; So j = i + t = 13 + 7 = 20.
